Text:
I've noticed that this title had been previously
uploaded in .flac back in 2011   I carefully try to avoid duplication but this time obviously not enough.

TAKE YOUR PICK; both appx 200MiB

ANONYMOUS is a tireless uploader!  He/She has
a collection of recordings that would fill 
multiple airport hangars!  HATS OFF TO ANON!
Keep 'em comin' man
You should check out bitsnoop, there is a Blue Mitchell box set, and much else.

THX!     

All I've got is (3) Riverside LP's remastered for CD


I figured BLUE had to be good based only upon the other musicians (sidemen) backing him
